author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بِاسْمِكَ الأَعْظَمِ فَأَنْزِلْ عَلَى أَحِبَّتِكَ ما يُقَرِّبُهُمْ إِلَيْكَ فِي كُلِّ الأَحْوالِ وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ المُقْتَدِرُ العَزِيزُ المُسْتَعَانُ.
translation: Send down, then, O my God, through Thy Most Great Name, upon Thy loved ones what will, under all conditions, draw them nearer unto Thee. Thou art, verily, the Almighty, the All-Glorious, Whose help is implored by all men.
